detectors.description:
owned.transferOwnership(address) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/00/007f0bea7c30834ac517cc1e6684b2aaae2f1c0d_CO2C.sol#19-21) should emit an event for: 
	- owner = newOwner (../../../Desktop/mainnet/00/007f0bea7c30834ac517cc1e6684b2aaae2f1c0d_CO2C.sol#20)

owned.transferOwnership(address).newOwner (../../../Desktop/mainnet/00/007f0bea7c30834ac517cc1e6684b2aaae2f1c0d_CO2C.sol#19) lacks a zero-check on :
		- owner = newOwner (../../../Desktop/mainnet/00/007f0bea7c30834ac517cc1e6684b2aaae2f1c0d_CO2C.sol#20)
TokenERC20._transfer(address,address,uint256) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/00/007f0bea7c30834ac517cc1e6684b2aaae2f1c0d_CO2C.sol#66-82) is never used and should be removed
detectors.markdown: [TokenERC20._transfer(address,address,uint256)](../../../Desktop/mainnet/00/007f0bea7c30834ac517cc1e6684b2aaae2f1c0d_CO2C.sol#L66-L82) is never used and should be removed

detectors.description: Contract owned (../../../Desktop/mainnet/00/007f0bea7c30834ac517cc1e6684b2aaae2f1c0d_CO2C.sol#7-22) is not in CapWords
Contract tokenRecipient (../../../Desktop/mainnet/00/007f0bea7c30834ac517cc1e6684b2aaae2f1c0d_CO2C.sol#24) is not in CapWords
Parameter TokenERC20.transfer(address,uint256)._to (../../../Desktop/mainnet/00/007f0bea7c30834ac517cc1e6684b2aaae2f1c0d_CO2C.sol#92) is not in mixedCase
Parameter TokenERC20.burn(uint256)._value (../../../Desktop/mainnet/00/007f0bea7c30834ac517cc1e6684b2aaae2f1c0d_CO2C.sol#154) is not in mixedCase

approveAndCall(address,uint256,bytes) should be declared external:
	- TokenERC20.approveAndCall(address,uint256,bytes) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/00/007f0bea7c30834ac517cc1e6684b2aaae2f1c0d_CO2C.sol#137-145)
Moreover, the following function parameters should change its data location:
_extraData location should be calldata
